html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-13802018-11-08, 
ActNatural Sciences and Engineering Research Council Act
PrecisAppointment of DIGVIR S. JAYAS of Winnipeg, Manitoba, to be Interim President of the Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council on a part-time basis, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year, or until such time as a new President is appointed, whichever occurs first; and effective at the end of the said term, re-appoints DIGVIR S. JAYAS, as a member of the Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council, until May 14, 2021.
AttachmentsAttachment
